content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=r7mWq9YN\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\nCoreLogic combines public, contributory, and proprietary data to develop predictive decision analytics and provide business services that bring dynamic insight and transparency to the markets it serves. CoreLogic has built one of the largest and most comprehensive U.S. real estate, mortgage application, fraud, and loan performance databases and is a recognized leading provider of mortgage and automotive credit reporting, property tax, valuation, flood determination, and geospatial analytics and solutions. More than one million users rely on CoreLogic to assess risk, support underwriting, investment, and marketing decisions, prevent fraud, and improve business performance in their daily operations. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WHERE IS CORELOGIC ACCOUNT INSIDE CoreLogic account growth \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The account appeared in EPAM in 2011. Initially, EPAM worked with another company, Marshall & Swift/Boeckh (MSB), which deals with insurance and underwriting. They helped clients to calculate the cost of real estate insurance, risk accounting, taxes, and other parameters. A few years later, they were acquired by\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"
